apolloSoyuz.title: Apollo-Soyuz
apolloSoyuz.description: In July 1975, American astronauts and Soviet cosmonauts rendezvoused and docked in orbitâ€”the first international crewed space mission. Tom Stafford and Alexei Leonov shook hands through the hatch, symbolizing detente during the Cold War. This mission pioneered techniques used on the ISS.
